column4: I'm connected to internet using wifi (ath0)... I need to share this wifi internet connection with another computer using ethernet (eth0)... I'm using Firestarter firewall to set up the sharing, but it keeps telling me eth0 is not ready....
Router belongs to my neighbor upstairs, I use wifi to get the signal, I cannot run an ethernet cable from the router to the other PC
the other PC does not have wireless
use wifi,  and a nic and share out the connection?
